name: Mountain Highlands and Hotspring Experience
description: Feel the coolness and breathe the freshness of the refreshing mountain air. Malaysia's first Unesco World Heritage Site Kinabalu Park boasts some of the most unique flora and fauna in the world. Trip highlights include Pekan Nabalu which allows an insight into the livelihood of the Dusun people of Sabah, Kinabalu Park - home to Mt. Kinabalu, the highest mountain in Malaysia, Desa Cattle Farm and Poring Hot Springs - tropical forest canopy and home to the Rafflesia, the world's largest flower.
